1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Simple content type.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content.Simple
6  ( -- * Simple contents
7    -- ** Boolean
8    CBool (..), true, false, putTrue, putFalse,
9    -- ** Decimal
10    CDec (..), pInt, pInteger, pDecFromInt, pDecFromInteger,
11    -- ** Clock and time
12    CClock (..),
13    CTime (..),
14    -- ** Textual
15    CCode (..),
16    CTerm (..),
17    CText (..), pMaybeText,
18  ) where
19
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                as O
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type               as D
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content.Singleton  as D
24
25
26-- --------------------------------------------  Simple contents
27
28-- ----------------------  Bool
29
30-- | True or false, affirmed or denied.
31class (D.CTypeOf c) => CBool c where
32    isBool      ::       c -> Bool
33    pBool       ::    Bool -> c
34    gBool       ::       c -> Bool
35
36    getBool     ::  B.Ab c -> B.Ab Bool
37    getBool     =   D.getAbAb isBool gBool
38
39    putBool     ::    Bool -> B.Ab c
40    putBool     =    Right . pBool
41
42true, false :: (CBool c) => c
43true  = pBool True
44false = pBool False
45
46putTrue :: (CBool c) => B.Ab c
47putTrue  = putBool True
48
49putFalse :: (CBool c) => B.Ab c
50putFalse = putBool False
51
52-- ----------------------  Dec
53
54-- | Decimal number.
55class (D.CTypeOf c) => CDec c where
56    isDec       ::           c -> Bool
57    gDec        ::           c -> D.Decimal
58    pDec        ::   D.Decimal -> c
59
60    getDec      ::     B.Ab c -> B.Ab D.Decimal
61    getDec      =      D.getAbAb isDec gDec
62
63    putDec      ::   D.Decimal -> B.Ab c
64    putDec      =    Right . pDec
65
66pInt :: (CDec c) => Int -> c
67pInt = pDec . fromInteger . toInteger
68
69pInteger :: (CDec c) => Integer -> c
70pInteger = pDec . fromInteger
71
72pDecFromInt :: (CDec c) => Int -> c
73pDecFromInt = pInt
74
75pDecFromInteger :: (CDec c) => Integer -> c
76pDecFromInteger = pInteger
77
78-- ----------------------  Clock
79
80-- | Distance between two points in timeline.
81class (D.CTypeOf c) => CClock c where
82    isClock      ::           c -> Bool
83    gClock       ::           c -> D.Clock
84    pClock       ::     D.Clock -> c
85
86    getClock     ::      B.Ab c -> B.Ab D.Clock
87    getClock     =       D.getAbAb isClock gClock
88
89    putClock     ::     D.Clock -> B.Ab c
90    putClock     =      Right . pClock
91
92-- ----------------------  Time
93
94-- | Point in timeline.
95class (D.CTypeOf c) => CTime c where
96    isTime       ::           c -> Bool
97    gTime        ::           c -> D.Time
98    pTime        ::      D.Time -> c
99
100    getTime      ::     B.Ab c -> B.Ab D.Time
101    getTime      =      D.getAbAb isTime gTime
102
103    putTime      ::   D.Time -> B.Ab c
104    putTime      =    Right . pTime
105
106-- ----------------------  Code
107
108-- | Code.
109class (D.CTypeOf c) => CCode c where
110    isCode       ::           c -> Bool
111    gCode        ::           c -> String
112    pCode        ::      String -> c
113
114    getCode      ::      B.Ab c -> B.Ab String
115    getCode      =       D.getAbAb isCode gCode
116
117    putCode      ::      String -> B.Ab c
118    putCode      =       Right . pCode
119
120-- ----------------------  Term
121
122-- | Term name.
123class (D.CTypeOf c) => CTerm c where
124    isTerm       ::           c -> Bool
125    gTerm        ::           c -> String
126    pTerm        ::      String -> c
127
128    getTerm      ::      B.Ab c -> B.Ab String
129    getTerm      =       D.getAbAb isTerm gTerm
130
131    putTerm      ::      String -> B.Ab c
132    putTerm      =       Right . pTerm
133
134
135-- ----------------------  Text
136
137-- | Double-quoted text content.
138class (D.CTypeOf c) => CText c where
139    isText      ::       c -> Bool
140    gText       ::       c -> String
141    pText       ::  String -> c
142
143    getText     ::  B.Ab c -> B.Ab String
144    getText     =   D.getAbAb isText gText
145
146    putText     ::  String -> B.Ab c
147    putText     =    Right . pText
148
149pMaybeText :: (CText c, D.CEmpty c) => String -> c
150pMaybeText s | O.trimLeft s == "" = D.empty
151             | otherwise          = pText s
152
